info.author: Paulo Carvalho pcarvalho@andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: The Resource Use component summarizes use information by student for a specified time interval. The input is a file with student usage information with required headers: Anon Student Id, errors, hints, time, problems, steps and date (last transaction time).
info.options: Last run dateDate the summary was last computed. Using standard ISO 8601, the required format is %Y-%m-%d, e.g., 2012-03-12.
